channel.title: RTÉ - Into the Deep
channel.itunes:author: RTÉ:Ireland
channel.description: 4-part science series, presented by Ella McSweeney, which gives listeners a window on marine biology and oceanography in Irish seas.
channel.itunes:subtitle: 4-part science series, presented by Ella McSweeney, which gives listeners a window on marine biology and oceanography in Irish seas.
channel.itunes:summary: 4-part science series, presented by Ella McSweeney, which gives listeners a window on marine biology and oceanography in Irish seas.

item.title: Into the Deep - Waves of Energy
item.itunes:author: RTÉ:Ireland
item.description: Ella McSweeney explores how we can harness wind, wave and tidal energy
item.itunes:subtitle: Ella McSweeney explores how we can harness wind, wave and tidal energy
item.itunes:summary: Ella McSweeney explores how we can harness wind, wave and tidal energy

item.title: Into the Deep - Marine Invaders
item.itunes:author: RTÉ:Ireland
item.description: Ella McSweeney finds out what impact alien marine species have on our oceans.
item.itunes:subtitle: Ella McSweeney finds out what impact alien marine species have on our oceans.
item.itunes:summary: Ella McSweeney finds out what impact alien marine species have on our oceans.

item.title: Into the Deep - Mapping the Sea
item.itunes:author: RTÉ:Ireland
item.description: Ella McSweeney explores Ireland's underwater 'roadmap', 4,000 metres below sea level.
item.itunes:subtitle: Ella McSweeney explores Ireland's underwater 'roadmap', 4,000 metres below sea level.
item.itunes:summary: Ella McSweeney explores Ireland's underwater 'roadmap', 4,000 metres below sea level.

item.title: Into the Deep - Reef Encounters
item.itunes:author: RTÉ:Ireland
item.description: Ella McSweeney presents a marine biology programme on Ireland's coral reefs.
item.itunes:subtitle: Ella McSweeney presents a marine biology programme on Ireland's coral reefs.
item.itunes:summary: Ella McSweeney presents a marine biology programme on Ireland's coral reefs.
